channel.title: Software Build Tools Interoperability (Make, Ant, Maven) on The Community for Open Innovation and Collaboration
channel.description: Recent content in Software Build Tools Interoperability (Make, Ant, Maven) on The Community for Open Innovation and Collaboration

item.title: Software Build Tools Interoperability: Complete Scenario
item.author: webdev@eclipse-foundation.org (Eclipse Foundation)
item.description: Software Build Tools Interoperability: Complete Scenario We provide here the links to the different scenarios which have been used to create this complete use case. These scenarios are available from the ATL Transformation Zoo. Each of them may be used within other use cases, in other different contexts or for other purposes. List of scenarios used in this use case ATL Scenario Make to Ant Ant to Maven

item.title: Software Build Tools Interoperability: Used Metamodels
item.author: webdev@eclipse-foundation.org (Eclipse Foundation)
item.description: Software Build Tools Interoperability: Used Metamodels We provide here the links to all the metamodels which have been developped and/or used within this use case. These metamodels are available resources that may be used within other use cases, in other different contexts or for other purposes. Each of them is provided in the Eclipse Ecore standard format and also in the KM3 textual format. Metamodels Ecore format KM3 format XML XML Ant Ant Make Make Maven (maven.
